about.about_desc: I am Mr. Feeman. I am smart, surrounded by fools. I am honest, surrounded by crooks. I am a genius, surrounded by the rabble. But who am I really? I am a rich and independent developer you've been looking for all your life. I launch cool projects and don't tolerate nonsense. Mr. Feeman is not just a meme coin; it's your chance to earn real money. My team and I run our business openly, hiding nothing from you. Our public wallet holds $50,000, and we spend it on marketing. We don't prove our honesty â€“ we just do.
